description: This file contains the implementation of basic functions for a general 'Ansc Light Component' object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, initialization, and retrieving object ID. It provides the core lifecycle functions for this component type within the larger system.

classes.name: ANSC_LIGHT_COMPONENT_OBJECT
classes.description: A structure representing the basic container object for an 'Ansc Light Component', containing member variables such as context handles, object ID, and function pointers for lifecycle methods.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscLcoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes an instance of the 'Ansc Light Component' object, setting up function pointers and calling enrollment and initialization routines.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLcoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the object and frees allocated memory.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLcoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls all subordinate objects used by this component; currently a stub returning success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLcoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the object, setting function pointers such as GetOid.

methods.name: ULONG AnscLcoGetOid(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the object identifier (OID) of this component.
